p: However, despite these efforts, this novel virus was able to spread via infected people traveling within China and internationally. Furthermore, the mechanism of spillover that led to human infection is still uncertain, although it has all the hallmarks of a bat-origin SARS-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) [ 4].
